description.narrative: Funding under this initiative provides support for key stabilisation activities in areas of conflict, focusing on support for livelihoods and recovery, including: internally displaced persons returning to their conflict affected communities in Northern Sri Lanka; contribution to the UN Country Team in Nepal to support ongoing peace process; a fragile states study of Burma; re-establishment of the CPSRG contingency fund; peacebuilding training enhancing support and participation of Philippine Marine Corps in the Mindanao Peace Process; promoting youth civic participation and child protection in the reintegrations of internally displaced persons in East Timor; supporting the reintegration of former child combatants in Nepal focusing on the special needs of girls; support for the Peace Dividend Trust study on the economic impact of RAMSI in the Solomon Islands; and extending the Creating Opportunities for Economical Revival and Development in the Eastern Province Sri Lanka.
